column4: what is a command I can run (apt-get <some flags/flags ? >  to find out what apps are installed but exclude anything that's part of the core system ?
use "dpkg -l | grep ^ii" and then get all packagenames from the core-system and diff the two results
right on, but, what does ^ii stand for (some kind of posix I'm guessing) - and - how to I "get all packagenames from the core-system" ?
